JobDescribe:
Job Title: e-commerce Shopping Feed and Affiliate Specialist
Based at: Guangzhou China

Responsibilities – General:
·         Manage price comparison engines and marketplaces including direct hands on work for campaigns, optimization, reporting and analysis
·         Daily monitoring of feeds
·         Implement successful bidding strategies and effective campaign management
·         Work with web analytics to monitor performance by channel
·         Evaluate and maintain effective categorization of products to each price comparison engine
·         Lead technical shopping feed and marketplace projects with IT team to execute development and necessary updates/changes
·         Manage existing affiliate marketing programs including attracting new affiliates, running campaigns, optimization and analysis
·         Optimize all aspects of our affiliate program through established and new networks;
·         Implement initiatives that enhance price comparison engine as well as affiliate productivity, create new growth opportunities and increase ROI
·         Work with the marketing manager to help with overall traffic acquisition strategies
·         Manage price comparison engines and affiliate relations and communication
·         Conduct reporting and meetings as required
·         Deliver reports to the marketing manager and recommend actions from your insights
 
Qualification & Competency
·         E-commerce experience
·         Knowledge of data feed management, price comparison engines, bidding strategies, affiliate marketing and PPC advertising
·         Experienced Google Analytics user
·         Channel Advisor platform experience desired
·         Experience with Product Listing ads through Google AdWords
·         Advanced MS Office skills
·         Strong analysis, campaign optimization and ROI skills
·         An excellent work ethic, problem solving and proficient time management skills
·         Organized and able to work autonomously
·         Work effectively in a team environment
·         Passion for learning
·         Good command of the English language, both oral and written.
